body:
Do you want NBA Power Rankings from a professional sports betting model? Then you're in the right place. Far more accurate than any NBA journo or content marketing kid, these NBA Power Rankings are created by a market beating Model. You won't see it get carried away by a few good games or some lucky momentum. It's emotionless and objective. We'll update the NBA Power Rankings every week. - - - ## **NBA Power Rankings** ![NBA Power Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-power-rankings-feb-9-bet-refinery.png "NBA Power Rankings for week 2") What does the Rating mean? The LA Lakers at 6.84 means the Lakers are 6.84 points better than average. Cleveland -6.64 means 6.64 worse than average. The number doesn't include home ground advantage either. So Lakers vs Cavs at Staples is going to create a monster line on our **[NBA Predictions Model](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-predictions)**. - - - ## **NBA Power Rankings Commentary** Utah is the third best team in the game, clearly above the Clippers. Brooklyn's still stuck in the middle and are unconvincing to the Model. The Model is finally catching up to the 76ers but still doesnt rate Embiid's crew as high as the market. Houston's position would shock many NBA fans but they're one to watch on our **[NBA Predictions Model](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-predictions)**. - - - ### **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ### **
** - - - ## **More NBA Resources** We LOVE betting futures. Get our predictions before the year, as well as our quarterly updates: * **[NBA Rookie Of The Year](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-rookie-of-the-year/)**[](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/) * **[NBA MVP](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/)** * [](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-mvp-odds/)**[NBA Championship Odds & Picks](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-championship-odds/)**
